string.description: Content description of the PlayPause button. It lets the user start or pause the playback of a media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_pause_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Play button. It lets the user start the playback of a media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_play_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekToNext button. It lets the user navigate to the next media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_to_next_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekToPrevious button. It lets the user navigate to the previous media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_to_previous_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekForward button. It lets the user to seek forward in the current media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_forward_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekForward button, with the amount of seconds visible on the button icon. It lets the user to seek forward in the current media by the specified amount of seconds. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_forward_button_seconds_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekBack button. It lets the user to seek back in the current media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_back_button_content_description

string.description: Content description of the SeekBack button, with the amount of seconds visible on the button icon. It lets the user to seek back in the current media by the specified amount of seconds. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_seek_back_button_seconds_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Shuffle state when shuffle is turned off. Shuffle refers to playing the songs in the current playlist in random order. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_shuffle_button_off_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Shuffle state when shuffle is turned on. Shuffle refers to playing the songs in the current playlist in random order. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_shuffle_button_on_content_description

string.description: Lets the user know that there no media selected to start playback. Appears on the Player screen where the media title is usually displayed. [CHAR_LIMIT=24]
string.name: horologist_nothing_playing

string.description: Used in tests only, for MediaCollectionsTile
string.name: sample_playlists_name

string.description: Section title for the Downloads list. Appears on the Browse screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: horologist_browse_downloads_title

string.description: Lets the user know that there no downloads available. Appears on the Browse screen, as a list item in the Downloads section. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_browse_downloads_empty

string.description: Lets the user know the progress of this individual download.
string.name: horologist_browse_downloads_progress

string.description: Section title for the Library list. Appears on the Browse screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: horologist_browse_library_title

string.description: Section title for the Playlists list. Appears on the Browse screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: horologist_browse_library_playlists

string.description: Button text for the Playlists screen. Appears on the Browse screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_browse_library_playlists_button

string.description: Button text for the Settings screen. Appears on the Browse screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_browse_library_settings_button

string.description: Appears on the Playlists screen, as a title for the screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: horologist_browse_playlist_title

string.description: Button text to download the playlist. It lets the user know that this playlist was never downloaded. Appears on the Playlist Download screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=22]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_download

string.description: Button text to cancel the download of the playlist. It lets the user know that this playlist is currently being downloaded. Appears on the Playlist Download screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_cancel

string.description: Content description of the Download button, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user start the download of the playlist. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_download_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Download in Progress button, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user know that the playlist is currently being downloaded, and lets the user cancel the download of the playlist. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_progress_button_cancel_content_description

string.description: Description of the action of the Download in Progress button on the screen of a playlist that is currently being downloaded. Lets the user know that taking this action, it will remove the download. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_progress_button_cancel_action_label

string.description: Content description of the Done button, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user know that the download of the playlist has been finished. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_download_done_content_description

string.description: Description of the action of the button on the screen of a playlist that is fully downloaded. Lets the user know that taking this action, it will remove the download. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_remove_download_action_label

string.description: Content description of the Shuffle button, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user start the playback of a list of media in a random order. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_shuffle_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Play button, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user start the playback of a media. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_button_play_content_description

string.description: Content description of the Chip of a media that is currently being downloaded, on the Playlist Download screen. It lets the user know that this specific media is currently being downloaded. Example: Song Name, Download in progress. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_media_chip_download_content_description

string.description: Lets the user know the progress of this individual download, when the size of the download is unknown. Appears on the Playlist Download screen, on a download item that is currently in progress. [CHAR_LIMIT=4]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_download_progress_unknown_size

string.description: Lets the user know the progress and the total size of this individual download. Example: 15% of 180MB. The measurement unit (KB, MB, GB..) will be added by the platform. Appears on the Playlist Download screen, on a download item that is currently in progress. [CHAR_LIMIT=13]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_download_progress_known_size

string.description: Lets the user know the app is trying to download this individual download. Appears on the Playlist Download screen, on an item that is currently trying to start to download. [CHAR_LIMIT=13]
string.name: horologist_playlist_download_download_progress_waiting

string.description: Default text to be displayed for the complication preview.
string.name: horologist_preview_app_name

string.description: A text to be displayed for the complication preview. It lets the user see an example of a complication that would be displayed on the watch face. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_preview_favorites
